page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: Brownies and Cubs are held in the old school hall-now Roslin Community hall. Girl Guides meet in Bilston Annexe. There is a miner's welfare social club with Bowling Green in both towns.There are local branches of the masonic lodge-The Royal British Legion and the Rotary club.Paradykes School has a community wing used by all age groups. Customs-Loanhead Gala week has been held annually since 1904.It opens with a carnival parade on a Fri.Evening in June.This forms a mile long procession with bands and Majorettes.People in fancy dress are on floats or on foot. Prizes are given for best dressed,most original and funniest characters.There are also prizes for decorated vehicles and floats.It is Midlothian's longest procession and crowds come to watch. During the week there are events e.g. service,sport,pram race.Sat.is the
